February 02, 2014YU-KAI HUANG Reading time ~1 minute

10款常見的破解密碼工具

主題：10款常見的破解密碼工具

說明： 這應該不用解釋吧！

  1. Brutus

  2. RainbowCrack http://project-rainbowcrack.com/

  3. Wfuzz http://www.edge-security.com/wfuzz.php

  4. Cain and Abel http://www.oxid.it/ca_um/

  5. John the Ripper http://www.openwall.com/john/

  6. THC Hydra https://www.thc.org/thc-hydra/

  7. Medusa http://www.foofus.net/jmk/tools/medusa-2.1.1.tar.gz

  8. OphCrack http://ophcrack.sourceforge.net/

  9. L0phtCrack http://www.l0phtcrack.com/download.html

  10. Aircrack-NG http://www.aircrack-ng.org/

http://resources.infosecinstitute.com/10-popular-password-cracking-tools/
